channel.title: life-at-dwarves on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in life-at-dwarves on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Meet Dat Nguyen: AI Dev Intern on hybrid working at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Life at Dwarves #27 shares the journey of @datnguyennnx, an AI/LLM intern. Starting out remotely, Dat soon saw the benefits of Dwarves’ hybrid working model.

item.title: Software design group: Nurturing architects at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The idea: A path to better software “Everything in software architecture is a trade-off, and the why is more important than how.

item.title: Meet Hieu Vu: Golang passion and Dwarves community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Life at Dwarves #6 is all about how Hieu Vu (@vdhieu) picked up Golang as his favorite programming, and how human factor happens to be the key element that ties him with Dwarves.

item.title: Meet Nam Nguyen: From Frontend to DevOps - A journey of continuous growth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: “The process of transformation and progress will never be easy, but you need it for a better version”. Life at Dwarves #5 is the career story of @nam, the Dwarves’s DevOps Engineer.

item.title: Meet An Tran: Senior engineer's growth journey
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: “I believe that on the journey to becoming a Senior Software Engineer, the more you challenge yourself, the more interesting things become.

item.title: Meet Tom Nguyen: Remote working fits him perfectly
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A catch-up with @tom - our Data Lead, and hear how remote working has fit him perfectly. Tom is one of our core contributors of Dwarves Brainery, and he’ll be playing as a key mentor for our upcoming Apprenticeship.

item.title: Meet Anh Tran: Crafting Dwarves' visual identity as Head of UI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: @anna, in short, is the UI wizard behind most of our branding identity. You’ll be seeing her work of art on every Dwarves’s digital asset.

item.title: Meet Thanh Pham: Ensuring a healthy environment for everyone to thrive
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Been with us for nearly 5 years, @thanh has been taking care of the juniors and ensuring their progress goes alongside the company’s direction.
